title: "Minnesota group uses artificial intelligence to aid monarch butterflies"
excerpt: "An artificial intelligence program called POLLi can count milkweed plants in images collected by drones. Milkweed is the host plant for monarch butterflies and critical for their survival. Similar technology is widely used in agriculture to check crop quality and monitor for disease."
